id.description: The sequential ID of the variant within the product.

prices.description: The prices of the variant. The prices does not contain two prices for the same price scope (same currency, country, customer group and channel).

id.description: The unique ID of this price.

customerGroup.description: A reference to a customer group.

validFrom.description: Date from which the price is valid.

validUntil.description: Date until which the price is valid.

discounted.description: Optional Set if a matching ProductDiscount exists. If set the Cart will use the discounted value for the cart price calculation.

url.description: URL of the image in its original size. This can be used to obtain the image in different sizes.

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the original image. This can be used by your application e.g. to determine whether the image is large enough to display a zoom view.

label.description: Custom label that can be used, for example, as an image description.

restockableInDays.description: The number of days it takes to restock a product once it is out of stock.
